user.title: Connect to EnergyMe
user.description: Enter the hostname/IP address and credentials for your EnergyMe device.

zeroconf_confirm.title: EnergyMe Device Discovered
zeroconf_confirm.description:
Found an **EnergyMe {model}** ready to save you money at **{host}**! 

Enter your credentials to start monitoring.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure EnergyMe Device

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate EnergyMe Device
reauth_confirm.description:
The credentials for your EnergyMe device at **{host}** are no longer valid. Please enter the new credentials to continue monitoring.

Your historical data will be preserved.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the EnergyMe device. Check the host and network.
error.cannot_connect_timeout: Connection to the EnergyMe device timed out. Check if it's online and the host is correct.
error.cannot_connect_http: Received an HTTP error from the EnergyMe device. Check logs for details.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Check your username and password.
error.device_mismatch: This device has a different ID than the one you're trying to reconfigure. Please ensure you're connecting to the correct device.

abort.already_configured: This EnergyMe device is already configured.
abort.not_energyme_device: The discovered device is not an EnergyMe device.
abort.reconfigure_successful: Device reconfigured successfully! The integration has been reloaded with the new connection details.
abort.reauth_successful: Authentication successful! The integration has been reloaded.
abort.reconfigure_failed: Failed to reconfigure the device. Please try again.

init.title: EnergyMe Options
init.description: Configure update frequency and which sensors to enable.

data_description.sensors: Select which sensor types to enable. At least one sensor must be selected.
